dmca.title: Digital Photo Secrets complains of copying
dmca.body:
The information in the following posts found on your Blogger network have been copied from my site without my knowledge or permission. Please remove these posts and instruct the author(s) not to continue to post my content. 

1. Identify in sufficient detail the copyrighted work that you believe has been infringed upon. http://www.digital-photo-secrets.com/tips/lens.html 

2. Identify the material that you claim is infringing upon the copyrighted work listed in item #1 above. 
http://techphoto.blogspot.com/2005/09/use-different-lenses-and-filters.html 

3. Provide information reasonably sufficient to permit Blogger to contact you 
My email address is: [private]@digital-photo-secrets.com 

4&5. Include the following statement: 

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. 

Signed, 

[private]
